metadata.title: MIRMARU Kids Assorted Cotton Fashion Socks for Boy and Girl.
features: PREMIUM QUALITY - High quality children's socks are made from a blend of 80% Cotton, 18% Polyester and 2% Spandex and are specially designed to protect young skin from irritations.It is extremely durable,soft and breathable.

BRIGHT DESIGNS - Socks contain 5 pairs in adorable assorted designs that your kid will love to wear with all their outfits !.Perfect for pairing with any outfits and shoes for all seasons. * Only COLOR 01 is high knee sock contain 3 pairs*
GOOD GIFT IDEA - High quality cotton socks is an awesome gift idea that you can choose for your daughter, little girl and boys in their birthdays and Christmas gift!

Grip and Comfort - Anti-slip on the bottom side to prevent slip.Only small size socks have silicone patterned grips bottom of the feet. It prevent slip and falls. Great for everyday walking and running around the without shoes.
description: Check out designs for your little ones!

These socks are so cute and cozy that your little one is bound to fall in love with them immediately! These lovely socks are a great gift for any fashionable kids. These cute socks will stay all day with the smile !
